mapper.update:
update ysh_operation_log
op_enterprise_name = #{opEnterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
op_name = #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ysh_operation_log set op_enterprise_name = #{opEnterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_name = #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_time = #{opTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, op_ip = #{opIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_code = #{opCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_content = #{opContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where op_id = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from ysh_operation_log where 1=1
and op_time >= date_sub(now(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND op_time <= now()
order by op_time desc
